Entry.JapaneseText: いっその事、おれが<Blue>闇の力<White>を持ってるって 言えば、ハックを救えるんじゃねーのか？
Entry.EnglishText: What if we told them I'm the one who has the <Blue>Power of Shade<White>? Wouldn't that save Hack?

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなコトしたら、今度は<Tytree>が 狙われちゃうよ！
Entry.EnglishText: If we did that, then they'd just go after you instead!

Entry.JapaneseText: 返り討ちにしてやるさ！
Entry.EnglishText: Then I'll just give them a taste of their own medicine!

Entry.JapaneseText: むしろ、この街の人々にとっては、<Blue>闇の力<White> などないと信じさせたほうがいい。
Entry.EnglishText: If anything, it would be better for the people in this town to believe that the <Blue>Power of Shade<White> doesn't exist.

Entry.JapaneseText: 人々の争いを止めるために<Blue>闇の力<White>を 手に入れた事を忘れるな……
Entry.EnglishText: Don't forget that you acquired the <Blue>Power of Shade<White> to help put an end to all this fighting.
